attributes.action: Reduce the speed limit to 50 mph on single carriageway roads
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: 50 mph on single carriageway roads was going to be brought in by the then New New Labour Gov. but they didn't do it.  So 10's of people every year have been killed in Accidents on these single roads. Now we have the chance to Save Lives!  50 mph on Single roads  Saves Lives!!
